comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: Hi Ross- 1967-08-30. And you can find out all sorts of additional information about the photo here and see more Gerald Williams Collection images in Flickr Commons here. Tiah

comment.author: 79524387@N00
comment._content:
Hi,  Thanks for the swift response.
I would have thought that the date was an important thing to put in the tags, especially for the really old stuff.  I see you have no tags for this image.  Do you want Flickr users to tag them? Or will you be following up with tags?

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
Feel free to tag them -- we're always happy for viewers to add whatever they would like to add!

And yes, it's usually a part of our upload process to add the date into the information about the image rather than as a tag, but since we've linked back to the locally hosted image in this case (where you can find things like the date, scanning specs, collection information, subject information, and original format of the image) we didn't add the date in this case. 

Tiah
